efficiency.description: The number of turns taken to complete the task

correct_actions_taken.description: Number of correct actions taken according to the task

task_completion.description: Did the user accomplish the task?

appropriate_THOUGHT.description: Did the user use THOUGHT appropriately in their responses?

command_format.description: Did the user use the correct format for their commands? (ACTION or THOUGHT)

legal_actions.description: Did the user choose actions from the available legal actions?
